T01sjdh_u:2: ekasmiṃ samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma,
T01sjdh_u:3: gṛdhrakūṭe mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ dvādaśabhir bhikṣuśatair evaṃ pramukhaiś cānekamahāśrāvakādibodhisattvabhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsikopāsikādevanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyarājāmātyapaurajānapadaparivāraiḥ
T01sjdh_u:4: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavāṃś catasṛbhiḥ parṣadbhiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ arcanādisaṃskṛtas tadā bodhisattvaviṣayasandarśanapraṇidhānavyūhasamādhiviṣayadhāraṇīsukhavyūhasamādhānanirdeśacaryāvaiśāradyamahāvaipulyabodhisattvānugatasarvabuddhaparigraha nāma dharmaparyāyasūtrāntaṃ bhāṣitum ārabdhavān /
T01sjdh_u:5: tadā nānāvarṇaraśmayo niścaritāyan prabhābhirayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātun mahatāvabhāsena sphuṭo 'bhūt //
T01sjdh_u:7: atha ratnavairocano nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvas taṃ mahānimittaṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasā sthāyaikāṃśam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇajānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat /
T01sjdh_u:9: bhagavan kuta ime raśmaya āgatāḥ? kasyaiṣa viṣayaprabhāvaḥ? ko 'tra
T01sjdh_u:12: asti kulaputra pūrvadakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi, ito buddhakṣetrakoṭīśatasahasragaṅgānadīvālukāsamān buddhakṣetrān atikramya padmā nāma lokadhātu nānāguṇaratnavibhūṣitā nānāratnakūṭāgārādivṛkṣapuṣpakariṇyupaśobhitā yatraikajātipratibaddhā bodhisattvāḥ padmottaratathāgataḥ sakāśad dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti /
T01sjdh_u:13: tatra lokadhātau indro nāma mahābodhivṛkṣaratnamayāny asti /
T01sjdh_u:15: tatrādyarātrau padmottareṇārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaḥ tatra padmāsananiṣaṇṇā bodhisattvāḥ tasya prātihāryāṇi paśyanti /
T01sjdh_u:16: te sarvalokadhātubhyaḥ āgatā bodhisattvās tāṃ pūjayitvā tatra sthitāḥ /
T01sjdh_u:18: atha padmottaratathāgatas teṣāṃ āśayānuśayaṃ jñātvā bahujanahitāya sukhāya lokānukampāya devamanuṣyāṇāñ ca hitāya mahāyānasya paripūraṇārtham avaivartikadharmacakraṃ pravartitavān /
T01sjdh_u:20: bhagavan kiyac ciraṃ sā lokadhātuḥ padmottaras tathāgatas tiṣṭhati saddharmaṃ vā /
T01sjdh_u:23: triṃśadantarakalpāni, saddharmaṃ daśāntarakalpāṇ sthāsyati, ye yatra jātā
T01sjdh_u:25: pūrvañ ca kulaputra sā lokadhātuś candanā nāma babhūva /
T01sjdh_u:26: na tv evaṃ pariśuddhā nākīrṇaśuddhasattvā yathaitarhi sā lokadhātuḥ /
T01sjdh_u:27: kulaputra candanāyāṃ lokadhātau candrottamo nāmābhūt tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvat
T01sjdh_u:29: tasya parinirvāṇakālasamaye cāpy ekatyā bodhisattvāḥ praṇidhānavaśenānyadbuddhakṣetraṃ saṃkrāntāḥ
T01sjdh_u:31: adyarātrau madhyame yāme candrottamas tathāgataḥ parinirvāsyati tasya daśāntarakalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati /
T01sjdh_u:35: tena khalu punaḥ samayena gaganamudro nāma bodhisattvaḥ sa pūrvapraṇidhānena candrottamena tathāgatena vyākṛtaḥ /
T01sjdh_u:36: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ kulaputra mama parinirvṛtasya daśāntarakalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati;
T01sjdh_u:37: rātryāḥ prathame yāme me saddharmāntarahāsyati, tatraiva rātryāḥ paścime
T01sjdh_u:38: yāme tvam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase, padmottaro nāma bhaviṣyasi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
T01sjdh_u:39: tatkāle ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yena candrottamas tathāgatas tenopajagmuḥ /
T01sjdh_u:40: upetya te sarve nānāprakārair bodhisattvavikurvaiś candrottamasya pūjāṃ kṛtvā bhagavantam etad avocan /
T01sjdh_u:41: icchāmo vayaṃ bhadanta bhagavann ime daśāntarakalpā nirodham avahitena cittenātināmayituṃ
T01sjdh_u:42: tatra khalu kulaputra candrottamas tathāgato gaganamudraṃ bodhisattvam āmantryaitad avocat
T01sjdh_u:43: udgṛhṇa tvaṃ kulaputremaṃ sarvajñātākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ sarvātītānāgatais tathāgataiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair yauvarājyābhiṣiktānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ deśitaṃ /
T01sjdh_u:44: ye caitarhi daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhantas te
T01sjdh_u:46: ye bhaviṣyanty anāgate 'dhvani buddhā bhagavantas te 'pi
T01sjdh_u:50: jalijalini mahājalini phutke butke saṃmade mahāsaṃmade, devām aṭi caṭi
T01sjdh_u:51: ṭake ṭharaṭharkke amimakasi hili cili tili ruruke mahāruruke, jaya durjaye jaye jayamati śānte śāntanirghoṣaṇi, amūlaparichinne, mārasainya
T01sjdh_u:52: vitrāsane, mukte muktapariśuddhe, abhite bhayamocane, bhāra charaṇā dānta
T01sjdh_u:53: vidyāvidyā varuttame, nigrahaṃ parivādināṃ, dharmavādinām anugrahaṃ,
T01sjdh_u:54: ārakṣa dharmavādināṃ caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānām adhimuktipadaprakāśanapadam idaṃ /
T01sjdh_u:56: buddhakāśaye amama nimama, avevi arthe arthani stīraṇe, lokādhimukte,
T01sjdh_u:59: bhāṣithe bhāṣaṇe, dhāre dhārayati, gupte śubhaprabhe tatphale agraphale niṣphale nilaha amukta amukta nirmukte, atravita vimuktavati, vilaphala,
T01sjdh_u:60: ayukta iviti, yiviti ratitula, tulamaṃ ahiṃsāma itivāva, atvānatvāna
T01sjdh_u:61: sarvaloke, aneka livindha abhūsare, hatamatte, veśāgravate, aphala,
T01sjdh_u:65: jaḍata, aniharavavatavyo idaṃ phalaṃ, niyāmaphalaṃ, samudānāya vibhūṣa,
T01sjdh_u:66: pasye somantra, anumatto akumatto, chedāvane mantrastā daśabala
T01sjdh_u:67: vigrahasthā, isusthita, sunikhama, tīkṣṇāmati, āloko, atitṛṣṇā, adimati,
T01sjdh_u:71: anye manye mane, mamane, vire virate, śame śamitāvi, śānte mukte nirakṣame, same samasame, kṣaye akṣaye, ajiti śānte samiṣṭhe, dhāraṇī
T01sjdh_u:73: kṣayanidarśane, lokapradīpanidarśane, caturṇāṃ pratisaṃvidām adhimuktipadaprakāśapadam idaṃ /
T01sjdh_u:75: cakṣu ābhāse nidarśane jñānālokanidarśanañ ca, prabhāsane sarvendriya bhūmātikrānte, sarvasava vamāṃ, sarve prāthavā kṣayaṃ kare, gokāha vadane,
T01sjdh_u:78: acale buddhe vṛddhapracale, satva gṛhṇa siddhi, kaṃpati nisiddha smahiṭṭe
T01sjdh_u:79: parekasire, some cande datve acala acala apare vicivale nipale pracacale
T01sjdh_u:80: [Page 12] prasare, anaya abhyāse, kaṃkame prabhāvini, drāme nijaso grakkrame nayane indriyāṇāṃ balānām adhimuktipadaprakāśapadam idaṃ /
T01sjdh_u:82: puṣpe supuṣpe, drumaparihāre, abhayarucire, cekaratke, akṣayam astu,
T01sjdh_u:83: ninire mamale, pañcaśiśire, lokasya vijñāne, nayasaṃgṛhīte ca yukte
T01sjdh_u:86: cakravajre, maitra samāpade, krānte kete, karuṇa rudīkṣayi, prītirūpe
T01sjdh_u:87: kṣamasaṃpanne, arake varate, kharo khare, amūle mūle, sādhane, caturṇāṃ vaiśāradyānām adhimuktipadaprakāśapadam idaṃ /
T01sjdh_u:89: vartte cakre cakradhare varacakre vare pravare, hile hire dhare,
T01sjdh_u:90: ārūpāvate, huhure yathā jibhaṃga niṃvare, yathāparaṃ cariniśe yathā
T01sjdh_u:91: bhayaririśi, satyanirhāre, jaravila, viryanihāra, cūre mārganihāra samādhinihāra prajñānihāra vimuktinirhāra, vimuktijñānadarśananihāra nakṣatranirhāra candranirhāra sūryanirhāra, padāñ caturuttaratathāgatena adbhutaṃ, niradbhutaṃ saṃbuddhaṃ abuddha ihabuddhaṃ, tatrabuddhaṃ
T01sjdh_u:92: nihaṃgamapare, araha daraha paṇḍale [Page 13] paṇḍale tatrārtalu,
T01sjdh_u:93: māṃgagharaṇi pūṭani saṃprapūṭani, gatapraṃgamanu niruva, nāśani
T01sjdh_u:94: nāśabandhani, cchicchini, cchicchidrama, yova hiḍiṃgamā vare mare, hanane,
T01sjdh_u:95: bhare bhare bhunde bhire bhire ruṣare, saraṇe, daraṇe, pravartte,
T01sjdh_u:96: calanāḍaye, vidraṃvumā varakhumā, brahmacāriṇa, indravani, dhidhirāyani,
T01sjdh_u:97: maheśvaralalani, mamasume, aramini ekākṣara vivañcani, carasti ābhicandāra sūre, sarvasūrā āvarasūrā, punakanitāṃ, maṇḍitāṃ āyinakaṇḍi jabhāme,
T01sjdh_u:98: gandhare, atra runimakare, bhirohini siddhamatte, vilokamate,
T01sjdh_u:101: samanantarārabdhe khalu punar bhagavatāsmiṃ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśe 'yaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakaṃpitā; tathāvabhāsena daśasu dikṣu sarve lokadhātavaḥ samapāṇītalajātā sphuṭā saṃdṛśyante /
T01sjdh_u:102: ye 'pi teṣv avasthitāḥ samādhidhāraṇīkṣāntipratilabdhā bodhisattvās tathāgatabalena svakasvakeṣu
T01sjdh_u:103: [Page 14] buddhakṣetreṣv antarhitā imāṃ sahālokadhātum āgatvā gṛdhrakūṭe
T01sjdh_u:104: bhagavataḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntās tasya pādau śirasā vanditvā nānāprakāraiḥ pūjāṃ kṛtvā tatraiva niṣeduḥ sarvajñatākāradhāraṇīmukhapraveśaśravaṇārthaṃ /
T01sjdh_u:105: gaṇanāsamatikrāntāś ca devanāgayakṣāsuragaruḍamanuṣyakumbhāṇḍapiśācādayas sannipatitās te tatra padmābuddhakṣetraṃ mahatā bodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtaṃ tathāgataṃ ca paśyanti
T01sjdh_u:106: / samanantarodāhṛtasyeyaṃ dhāraṇīmukhapraveśasya bhagavatā dvāsaptatibhir gaṅgānadīvālukāsamair bodhisattvair iyaṃ dhāraṇī pratilabdhā daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātusthāṃ buddhān bhagavataś ca guṇavyūhān paśyanti sma /
T01sjdh_u:107: te āścaryaprāptā buddhapūjāṃ kṛtvā samādhibalena tasthuḥ /
T01sjdh_u:109: imāṃ kulaputra dhāraṇīmukhapraveśaṃ bodhisattvo bhāvayamānaś caturaśītidhāraṇīśatasahasrāṇi dvāsaptatiś ca ṣaṣṭiñ ca sahasrāṇi pratilabhate mahāmaitrīkaruṇādayaḥ /
T01sjdh_u:110: ye ca māṃ dhāraṇīṃ śroṣyanti te 'vaivartino bhaviṣyanti /
T01sjdh_u:111: ye likhiṣyanti te buddhadarśanena saddharmaśravaṇena saṅghopasthānenāvirahitā bhaviṣyanti
T01sjdh_u:113: [Page 15] ye svādhyāyanti teṣāṃ sarvāṇy akarmāni parikṣayaṃ gacchati /
T01sjdh_u:114: ye bhāvayanti teṣāṃ pañcānantaryāṇy akarmāni naśyuḥ /
T01sjdh_u:118: ye parebhyaś ca vistareṇa bhāṣayanti te tathāgatā bhavanti //
T01sjdh_u:119: atha khalu bhagavān maitreyaṃ bodhisattvam etad avocat /
T01sjdh_u:120: yaiḥ khalu kulaputrātītānāgatapratyutpannais tathāgatair arhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhair asyā dhāraṇyāḥ prabhāvena samyaksaṃbodhiḥ prāptāmaḥ /
T01sjdh_u:121: mayā bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya sakāśād imān dhāraṇīṃ prāptā, asyā dhāraṇyāḥ prabhāvena samyaksaṃbodhiḥ prāptā, etarhy api mayā dhāritā vācitā parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśitā /
T01sjdh_u:122: evaṃ khalu maitreya yathā gaganamudrabodhisattvena candrottamatathāgatasya sakāśād imāṃ dhāraṇīṃ prāptā dhāritā vācitā, 'syā dhāraṇyāḥ prabhāvena gaganamudro bodhisattvaḥ candrottamatathāgatasya parinirvāṇād yasyāṃ rātrau prathame yāme saddharmāntarhite tasyāṃ paścime yāme samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prāptā padmāyāṃ lokadhātau padmottara nāma tathāgato [Page 16] bhavati /
T01sjdh_u:123: tathā kulaputra mama sakāśād iyaṃ drāviḍamantrapadā sarvajñatākāradhāraṇī dhāraya vācaya vistareṇa parebhyaś ca saṃprakāśaya /
T01sjdh_u:124: asyāḥ prabhāvena maitreyāśītivarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ maitreyo nāma tathāgato 'rhaṃ
T01sjdh_u:126: tena te maitreyaitarhi mamāntikād yauvarājyaṃ parigṛhītaṃ, yathātītānāṃ tathāgatānām antikād atītair bodhisattvair yauvarājyaṃ parigṛhītāḥ //
T01sjdh_u:127: tatra khalu bhagavān sarvāvatīṃ parṣadam avalokya tasyāṃ velāyām imāni mantrapadāny abhāṣata
T01sjdh_u:129: dāntabhūmiḥ damathabhūmiḥ smṛtibhūmiḥ prajñābhūmir vaiśāradyabhūmiḥ pratisaṃvidbhūmir anutkṣepabhūmiḥ samatāparikṣayopekṣabhūmir jātikṣayabhūmir muja vinmujaḥ, malatmajaḥ, visāgraḥ, daśāvate veśataḥ teraṇa, veśalagra, śamuśavataḥ, vimati vimati yopahira regamata vasisakrama iticoravate, makhe mudra daharavate prajñākṣā bubu dahakramitā
T01sjdh_u:130: sadoṣavantaḥ elaya tilaya ahusuṭā amundhamaṃ arthavati, muruvati,
T01sjdh_u:131: tehīnadvivā, akanati bakanate samake visābhaṭe, iṭe iṭabale [Page 17] atra tatra kuruṣaṃ laruṣaṃ, latatha katha sarvanta sarvantavaḥ aniruddhaḥ dihakhatambi, phala bahuphala, śataphala, śiṣṭavate, api devānāṃ bhagavāṃ
T01sjdh_u:132: pratītyasamutpādapratisaṃyuktāny adhimuktipadāni prakāśayati, eṣu prakāśyamāneṣu ṣaṣṭibhir devanayutaiḥ satyadarśanaṃ kṛtam abhūt /
T01sjdh_u:133: tatphalam agraphalaṃ, lalaha alaha nilaṃhare, vacatakhyā idaṃphalaṃ,
T01sjdh_u:134: niyāmaphalaṃ, namudaya vibhūkha, prajñācakra, sunirvṛticakra, jñānīcakra,
T01sjdh_u:135: ebhir adhimuktipadair daśānāṃ devakoṭīnāṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpāditāni tatraivāvaivartikāḥ sthitāḥ /
T01sjdh_u:136: paśya momate, anumate akumato akumati cchīdattake, mantasthā deśabala vipravasthaḥ, iśasthita, atimati tīkṣṇamati, āloko sterituṣṇa, ebhir adhimuktipadaiś catuḥṣaṣṭīnāṃ nāgasahasrāṇāṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
T01sjdh_u:139: aprabhā samadanā ahadyo bhagavadyo, karaṇyākṣa, siddhamati, samantakṣau,
T01sjdh_u:140: alabale, piṭakaro, mahābale, ojadaro dharaṇe migalakṣa, udākṣa, kukākṣa
T01sjdh_u:141: viroyo, virūpamukha, akṣihasta saṃkṣibala asurodina, asuropramardane,
T01sjdh_u:142: ebhir adhimuktipadair dvādaśānāṃ yakṣakoṭīnāṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpāditāni tatraivāvaivartikāḥ saṃvṛtāḥ /
T01sjdh_u:143: arthe pilile tinithe, saṃtīthe, katitena nakeme, nanamaste, ubherabhe,
T01sjdh_u:144: mudame, madame, matime, saniha śūre, dhāraṇīye sendra sadeva, sanāga,
T01sjdh_u:145: sayakṣāsuradevā, nāgā nirukti parivāra, niruktarāni, smṛti prajñā parivāramati pratilābhī, gatidhṛtiparivāra gatidhṛtilābhīḥ pūrvakeṣu
T01sjdh_u:146: hiteṣu caritavantaḥ, abhiskāmavantaḥ, śūravantaḥ ciravīryavantaḥ bhītavantaḥ sitabhāge, mārgamudra diśāpakarṣaṇi kṣaparahu, charaṇo devaracatu suramudra, yakṣamudra, rākṣasamudra, vedivedime, tape, tattape
T01sjdh_u:147: uṣṇāname, prakhādya, nanava dhāraṇīya, aviśa diśāśodhane, vākyaśuddhe
T01sjdh_u:148: jihvāśuddhe, vāciparikarmaḥ prajñā buddhi smṛti mati [Page 19] gati dhṛti gaṇana pratisaraṇabuddhiḥ, jayacakre śūnyacakre vyaya, ebhir adhimuktipadair ṣaṭpañcāśānām asurasahasrāṇāṃ anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
T01sjdh_u:151: durlabhaṃ kulaputra tathāgatānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo; durlabhā ime śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaparibhāvitāmī
T01sjdh_u:153: kulaputra tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā dānadamasaṃyamakṣāntivīryasamādhiprajñā parigṛhītā bahavo buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāḥ paryupāsitāḥ, kvacid dānan dattaṃ, śīlaṃ
T01sjdh_u:154: rakṣitaṃ, brahmacaryaṃ cīrṇaṃ, kvacid bhāvanā niṣevitā, kṣāntir bhāvitā,
T01sjdh_u:155: vīryam ārabdhaṃ, samādhir niṣpāditā, prajñā sevitā, bahvaprameyaṃ vividhanānāprakāraiḥ śubhakarma kṛtaṃ, yenaitarhi mayānuttaraṃ jñānaṃ
T01sjdh_u:157: anekāṃ kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṃ tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāñ caratā, mṛṣāpaiśunyaparuṣasaṃbhinnapralāpā [Page 20]
T01sjdh_u:158: varjitā, anekavidhaṃ kuśalaṃ vākkarmaṃ sevitaṃ bahulīkṛtaṃ /
T01sjdh_u:159: yenaitarhi prabhūtajihvā pratilabdhā, na hi kulaputra tathāgatārhatānyathā kathayanti /
T01sjdh_u:162: mukhāc ca jihvendriyaṃ nirṇāmayitvā svaṃ mukhaṃ pracchādya tasmāj jihvendriyāt ṣaṣṭiraśmikoṭyo pramuktās taiś cāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātur udāreṇāvabhāsena nirayatiryagyoniyamalokadevamanuṣyāḥ sphuṭā babhūvuḥ /
T01sjdh_u:163: te ca raśmayo ye nairayikāḥ sattvā agninā prajvalitagātrā dahyante teṣāṃ śītalā vāyavo
T01sjdh_u:164: vānti, yeṣāṃ spṛṣṭānāṃ tanmuhūrtaṃ sukhā vedanā prādurbabhūva /
T01sjdh_u:165: ekaikasya ca nairayikasya purataḥ buddhanirmitaṃ tiṣṭhati dvātriṃśadbhir lakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛta aśītibhiś ca, yaṃ dṛṣṭvā te nairayaikāḥ sukhasamarpitā buddhadarśanāpyāyitaśarīrā buddhaṃ dṛṣṭvaivaṃ cintayanto, 'sya
T01sjdh_u:166: sattvasyānubhāvenāsmābhiḥ sukhā vedanā pratilabdhās; te bhagavataḥ sakāśe
T01sjdh_u:170: bhoḥ sattvā evaṃ bhāṣadhvaṃ, namo buddhāya namo
T01sjdh_u:171: dharmāya namaḥ saṃghāya, nityam evaṃ sukhasamarpitā bhaviṣyatha /
T01sjdh_u:172: tatas te nairayikās sattvā añjaliṃ pragṛhya vācam udīrayanti, namo buddhāya namo
T01sjdh_u:174: atha te sattvās tena cittaprasādakuśalamūlena tataś cyavitvā ekatyā deveṣūpapannā ekatyā manuṣyeṣu, tathaiva pūrvavad yāvat /
T01sjdh_u:175: ye śītanārakāṃ sattvāḥ pretāḥ piśācā vā sukhasamarpitā devamanuṣyeṣūpapannā evaṃ devamanuṣyatiryakṣu lokeṣu raśmayas saṃcodanti /
T01sjdh_u:176: gaṇanātikrāntā devamanuṣyā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya niṣaṇṇā karuṇāpuṇḍarīka nāma mahāyānasūtradharmaśravaṇāya /
T01sjdh_u:177: tena ca samayena gaṇanātikrāntā devamanuṣyakāyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittāny utpādayām āsuḥ /
T01sjdh_u:179: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanā sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan //
